name: The Horned God's rituals
description:
You are a Druid who revere Cernunnos, the Horned God. Being the representation of the biological cycle of nature, he ask you to perform some rituals to regenerate the essence life wich as disappeared from an island.

(KeyBoard or Gamepad)

w/a/s/d (or z/q/s/d) or Left Stick(not recommended) or D-pad = Moving

Enter or A button (X on Ps controller) = Action

Prey (teleport to Cernunnos) or B button (or O on Ps controller) = R

(Did not have the time to make a credit scene, the game end after the 3rd rituals, but there is nothing that say so)

Game design, graphics : Savenhart, Skolga

Music : Chilled_Pirate
